testsuite.name: Test Amazon search functionality

testcase.name: As a Customer when I search for Alexa, I want to see if the third option on the second page is available for purchase and can be added to the cart.

testsuite.system-out: @Amazon @Cart Scenario: As a Customer when I search for Alexa, I want to see if the third option on the second page is available for purchase and can be added to the cart. # src/test/resources/features/AmazonSearch.feature:5 Given the user navigates to www.amazon.com # steps.AmazonSearchSteps.navigateToAmazon() And searches for Playstation # steps.AmazonSearchSteps.enterSearchCriteria(java.lang.String) And navigates to the second page # steps.AmazonSearchSteps.navigateToSecondPage() And selects the third item # steps.AmazonSearchSteps.selectsThirdItem() Then the user is able to add it to the cart # steps.AmazonSearchSteps.itemCanBeAddedToTheCart()
